parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: DTS job ID, which can be queried by calling [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~).

parameters.name: Parameters
parameters.description: The parameters that you want to modify. Specify a JSON string. For more information, see [Parameters](~~2536412~~).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region where the instance is located. For more details, see [List of Supported Regions](~~141033~~).
